Today I migrated the old blog from [fastpages](https://forums.fast.ai/t/fastpages-deprecating-fastpages-in-favor-of-quarto/99095/1) to [Quarto](https://quarto.org/).

Quarto works a bit different than fastpages, but I'm excited that it's being actively developed.
